Have a look here. We organized a Hausdorff Trimester on Combinatorial Optimization. With colleagues B. Guenin & L. Tuncel, we recently completed our undergraduate textbook on optimization - check it out here! Read articles on our collaboration with SickKids Hospital here, and here.
